mapper.select: select * from GROUPS where g_status = '1' order by g_idx desc
mapper.insert: insert into GROUPS(g_title,g_intro, g_fname,g_maxPeople, g_date, g_location, g_desc,g_status, u_idx) values(#{g_title},#{g_intro},#{g_fname},#{g_maxPeople},#{g_date},#{g_location},#{g_desc},1,#{u_idx})
mapper.update: update GROUPS set g_status= '0' where g_idx = #{g_idx}

update GROUPS set g_title= #{g_title},g_intro= #{g_intro},g_fname= #{g_fname},g_maxPeople= #{g_maxPeople}, g_date= #{g_date},g_location= #{g_location},g_desc= #{g_desc}, u_idx= #{u_idx} where g_idx = #{g_idx}
mapper.insert: insert into GROUPCOMMENTS(gc_content, gc_date, u_idx, g_idx) values(#{gc_content}, sysdate(), #{u_idx}, #{g_idx})
